title: Bronze ADC main looking for team or people to play ranked with
body:
I might be bronze but i believe i can easily climb out with a team
I main Jinx and Lucian. I also play kalista kindred ashe caitlyn and jhin
Would really like to join to a team message me here or in game.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 
Thanks C:

replies.body: Id be happy to help, but the problem is im gold. Im always looking out to group with players though. Im a botlane/jg main if your keen to add and play a few :)
hey I'd be happy to join. I don't really main a role but I'd be happy to learn support, with the right AD i think I could be pretty good. Add ingame if you want. I'm b5 but silver 5 in season 4.
I actually main support! Happy to add you and play some games.

Sorry i already found a support :C If you play any other roles your free to join
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
hey man im the same sick of getting put into trash teams, i main jg but can play any role. could be much higher ranked if got a good team together hit me up if you want
Sure C: Add me in game and we can plays {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
